title: The Late show
creator_credit: Robert Benton, Robert Altman and Warner Bros Pictures
brief_description: Ira Wells (Art Carney) is an ageing private eye trying to solve the murder of his ex-partner (Howard Duff), “helped” by Margo (Lily Tomlin), a flaky, aimless young woman. The chemistry between Carney and Tomlin is perfect and echoes of Chandler and Hammett resound in Benton’s complex but likeable script. This quietly authoritative show-stopper is a marvellous comment on classics like “The Maltese Falcon” and “The Big Sleep”, while at the same time taking its place beside them as a superior example of the genre. Also starring Bill Macy and Eugene Roche. Co-starring Joanna Cassidy, John Considine, Ruth Nelson, Howard Duff and John Davey.
